meanings.definition: Tacky or lowbrow in style or quality.
meanings.sent1: The decorations at the party were so kitschy.
meanings.sent2: She bought a kitschy souvenir from the gift shop.
meanings.sent3: The kitschy painting made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her outfit was a kitschy mix of colors and patterns.
meanings.sent5: The kitschy furniture clashed with the modern decor.

meanings.definition: Characterized by excessive sentimentality or melodrama.
meanings.sent1: The movie was so kitschy with its over-the-top emotions.
meanings.sent2: Her sentimental speech was a bit kitschy but heartfelt.
meanings.sent3: The kitschy romance novel made her cry and laugh.
meanings.sent4: His melodramatic acting was kitschy but entertaining.
meanings.sent5: The kitschy music video was full of exaggerated emotions.

meanings.definition: Something that is considered to be in poor taste or overly sentimental.
meanings.sent1: The painting was a kitschy piece that divided opinions.
meanings.sent2: She collected kitschies from different eras.
meanings.sent3: The kitschy gift made her cringe but secretly smile.
meanings.sent4: His room was filled with kitschies that he treasured.
meanings.sent5: The kitschy item was a conversation starter at the party.
